presently came alexander william bloir took earl dinner sent gantlet steelbonnet king came alexander bid deponent fetch key chamber william reynd went stair afterwards thomas cranston required deponent come earl commanded go alexander immediately earl followed bidding deponent ere alexander bade forthwith lockt within round chamber telling must stay till returned shortly came king opening door entred instantly alexander clapping hat pulled deponent dagger held king breast saying remember ye father murther shall die minting higness heart dagger deponent tript hand belief alexander retained dagger long one might go six step killed king therewith wanting dagger king gave gentle language excusing gowries death alexander say well keep quiet nothing shall • l brother king asked would answered bring brother taken oath king cry ope window till return lockt together king asked deponent answered servant lord king said lord kill deponent said oath shall die first alexander enters
